Answer: Three, lost one for each of the times he tried escaping from the plantation (p. 24, 41)

In Freewater by Amina Luqman-Dawson, what does Anna believe the arrow scar on her arm represents?
Answer: Directions for where she was meant to find her mother up North (p. 109)
